name: GitCrossCommit
description: Checks out a 2nd repo and adds files to the repo.
author: Doug Logan
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: repoUrl
inputs.label: Target Git Repository URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Git Repository URL to clone and commit the artifact to.

inputs.name: repoBranch
inputs.label: Target Git Repository Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Git Repository branch to commit the artifact to.

inputs.name: repoPath
inputs.label: The local file path where the git repository should be cloned.

inputs.name: sourcePath
inputs.label: The local file path to the artifact that should be copied.

inputs.name: destinationPath
inputs.label: The file path where the artifact should be copied to, relative to repoURL

inputs.name: commitMessage
inputs.label: The message to utilize when committing the file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The message to use when committing the artifacts.
